turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey, can you go on a coffee run to Starbucks for me?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure, what would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Grab me a Peppermint White Chocolate Mocha

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay what do you want in it?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Get it with everything, just how it comes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Whipped cream too? That's optional.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Umm actually no, no whipped cream.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Got it. What size?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'll do a grande.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Oh what about the milk?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Oh yeah, do nonfat milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright so grande with everything except whipped cream and nonfat milk right?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Actually do the 2% milk instead of nonfat.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Got it.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great, and you can use my online account and pay with that.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright will do. Do you want me to go ahead and order it now?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay I placed the order and I'll go pick it up in a minute. They'll text you the receipt.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Awesome, thanks!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You're welcome.

items.name: Grab me a Peppermint White Choco
